SELECT s.sharing_id, s.title, s.interest_num, s.status, s.created_at,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.sharing_id = s.sharing_id AND c.del_flag IS NULL ) AS comment_count,
( SELECT i.file_url FROM image i WHERE i.target_type = 'SHARING' AND i.target_id = s.sharing_id AND i.del_flag IS NULL ORDER BY i.image_id ASC, i.created_at ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS image_url
FROM sharing s JOIN member m ON s.member_id = m.member_id
WHERE m.address LIKE CONCAT(#{userAddress}, '%') AND s.del_flag IS NULL AND m.del_flag IS NULL AND (#{keyword} IS NULL OR #{keyword} = '' OR s.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM interest i JOIN sharing s ON i.sharing_id = s.sharing_id WHERE i.member_id = #{memberId} AND s.del_flag IS NULL

SELECT sharing_id, title, interest_num FROM sharing WHERE del_flag IS NULL AND interest_num IS NOT NULL AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY interest_num DESC, created_at DESC LIMIT 3
